column4: in system monitor processes i've viewed only my processes and it don't add up to 700mbs. it's like 300mbs ish. i have no idea why 400ish mbs is being used. as system monitor claims it's using.
also my cpu claims 17% is being used
use the top command. It will show you were the resources are being used. pstree will show you a tree of active processes as well.
